"Arch is the best" ã¯å¤šãã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°è¨€èªã«ç§»æ¤ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ï½¡ ``` ĞŸÑ€ĞµĞ´ÑƒĞ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ¶Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ("Arch is the best!"); ``` ``` REPORT zwhat_is_the_best. WRITE 'Arch is the best'. ``` ``` with Ada.Text_IO; use Ada.Text_IO; procedure ArchIsTheBest is begin Put_Line("Arch is the best!"); end ArchIsTheBest; ``` ``` 'Arch is the best!' ``` ``` display alert "Arch is the best!" say "Indeed, Arch is the best." ``` ``` IT'S SHOWTIME TALK TO THE HAND "Arch is the best!" YOU HAVE BEEN TERMINATED ``` ``` implement main () = println! "Arch is the best!" ``` ``` BEGIN { print "Arch is the best!" } ``` ``` 10 PRINT "Arch is the best!" ``` ``` @echo off echo Arch is the best! pause ``` ``` ++++++>+++++<+[>[->+<]<->++++++++++<]>>.<[-]>[-<++>] <----------------.---------------.+++++.<+++[-<++++++++++>]<. >>+.++++++++++.<<.>>+.------------.---.<<.>>---. +++.++++++++++++++.+.<<+.[-]++++++++++. ``` ``` #include #include int main(void) { puts("Arch is the best!"); return EXIT_SUCCESS; } ``` ``` using System; public class ArchIsTheBest { static public void Main () { Console.WriteLine ("Arch is the best!"); } } ``` ``` #include #include int main () { std::cout << "Arch is the best!" << std::endl; return EXIT_SUCCESS; } ``` ``` IDENTIFICATION DIVISION. PROGRAM-ID. TheBest. PROCEDURE DIVISION. DISPLAY "Arch is the best!". STOP RUN. ``` ``` alert 'Arch is the best!' ``` ``` (def translations {"english" "Arch is the best!", "german" "Arch ist das Beste!", "australian" "Arch is fair dinkum, mate!", "h4x0r" "arhc 51 7he be57!", "spanish" "Â¡Arch es el mejor!"}) (defn read-choice [] (println "\nAvailable languages: ") (doall (map #(println (keyÂ %)) translations)) (print "Enter language or Ctrl-c: ") (flush) (translations (read-line) :badinput)) (defn arch-is-the-best [] (loop [choice (read-choice)] (case choice :badinput (do (print "\nBad input!\n") (recur (read-choice))) (do (print "\n" choice "\n") (recur (read-choice)))))) ``` ``` (def translations {"english" "Arch is the best!", "german" "Arch ist das Beste!", "australian" "Arch is fair dinkum, mate!", "h4x0r" "arhc 51 7he be57!", "spanish" "Â¡Arch es el mejor!" "street" "Arch iz da shizzle ma nizzle"}) (while 1 (println "\nPick a language:\n" (map #(keyÂ %) translations) "\n language: ") (println (translations (read-line) "Not a valid language"))) ``` ``` (prn "Arch is the best!") ``` ``` #!/usr/bin/sbcl --script (defparameter *best-list* '((English "Arch is the best!") (Chinese "Arch, å¥¹å‡ºç±»æ‹”èƒ!") (German "Arch ist das Beste!") (Greek "Î¤Î¿ Arch ÎµÎ¯Î½Î±Î¹ Ï„Î¿ ÎºÎ±Î»ÏÏ„ÎµÏÎ¿!") (Latin "Arch est optimus!") (French "Arch est le meilleur!"))) (defun aitb () (format t "Available languages: ~{~{~@(~a~)~*~}~^, ~}.~%" *best-list*) (loop for input = (progn (format t "~&Input the desired language, (or 'quit'): ~%") (force-output) (read-line)) if (string-equal input "quit") do (loop-finish) else do (let ((language-def (assoc input *best-list* :key (lambda (lang) (symbol-name lang)) :test #'string-equal))) (if language-def (format t "~&~A~%" (second language-def)) (format t "~&Invalid language.~%")))) (format t "~&May the Arch be with you!~%")) (aitb) ``` ``` (princ "Arch is the best!") ``` ``` puts "Arch is the best!" ``` ``` # For giving the message to your friends require "http/server" server = HTTP::Server.new(80) do |context| context.response.content_type = "text/plain" context.response.print "Arch is the best!" end puts "Listening." server.listen ``` ``` #!/bin/csh echo "Arch is the best!" ``` ``` body * { display: none; } body::before { content: "Arch is the best!"; font-family: monospace; font-size: 2.7rem; position: absolute; left: 50%; top: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); } ``` ``` import std.stdioÂ : writeln; void main() { writeln("Arch is the best"); } ``` ``` main(){ print('Arch is the best'); } ``` ``` console.loge with ' So Arch' console.loge with ' Much Good' console.loge with ' Wow' ``` ``` DESCRIPTION="Arch is the best!" SRC_URI="https://wiki.archlinux.jp/index.php/Arch_%E3%81%AF%E6%9C%80%E9%AB%98" LICENSE="GFDL_1.3" SLOT="0" KEYWORDS="" IUSE="" DEPEND="" RDEPEND="" src_compile() { einfo "Arch is the best!" } ``` ``` (message "Arch is the best!") ``` ``` ğŸ ğŸ‡ ğŸ˜€ ğŸ”¤Arch is the best!ğŸ”¤ ğŸ‰ ``` ``` IO.puts "Arch is the best!" ``` ``` -module(arch). -export([is_the_best/0]). is_the_best() -> io:fwrite("Arch is the best!\n"). ``` ``` -module(arch). -export([ultimate_question/0,the_answer/0]). the_answer() -> receive {Client,who_is_the_best} -> ClientÂ ! {self(),"Arch is the best!"}; {Client,_} -> ClientÂ ! {self(),"Taco Taco Taco!"} end, the_answer(). ultimate_question() -> Pid = spawn(arch,the_answer,[]), PidÂ ! {self(),who_is_the_best}, receive {Pid,Response} -> io:format("~s~n",[Response]) end. ``` ``` printfn "Arch is the best!" ``` ``` "Arch is the best" print ``` ``` Dear Princess Celestia: Letter About Arch Linux. Today I learned: I wrote "Arch is the best!". Your faithful student, Twilight Sparkle ``` ``` ." Arch is the best" cr -- kiss way ``` ``` program arch print *,"Arch is the best!" end program arch ``` ``` init print "Arch is the best" ``` ``` #!/usr/bin/env gjs print ('Arch is the best'); ``` ``` package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("Arch is the best!") } ``` ``` println 'Arch is the best!' ``` ``` main = putStrLn "Arch is the best!" ``` ``` Arch is the best!

KTHXBYE ``` ``` print "Arch is the best!" ``` ``` bCBA@?>=<;:9876543210/.-,+*)('&%$#"!~}|{zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba`_^] \[ZYXWVUTSRQPONMLKJIHGFEDCBA@?>=<;:9y16543210/.-,+*)('&}C#"!~}|{zyxwvu tsrqponmlkjihgfedcba`_^]\[ZYXWVUTSRQPONMLK-CgGFEDCBA@?>=<;:98x6543210/ .-,+*)('&%$#"!~}|u;yxwpun4rqpRhmf,jihgIe^$ba`_^]\[ZYXQVUTMqQPONMFjJI+A eEDC%A:^>=<|:981U54t21*/.-&Jk)('&}C#"!aw={z\xwvun4lqpi/mlkjiKaf_%p ``` ``` disp('Arch is the best!'); ``` ``` writeln("Arch is the best!"); ``` ``` /* mbld -b aitb aitb.myr */ use std const main = { std.put("Arch is the best!\n") } ``` ``` ;nasm -f elf32 arch.asm ;ld -o arch arch.o ;./arch section .text global _start _start: mov edx,len mov ecx,msg mov ebx,1 mov eax,4 int 0x80 xor ebx,ebx mov eax,1 int 0x80 msg: db "Arch is the best!",10 len equ $-msg ``` ``` ;nasm -f elf64 arch.asm ;ld -o arch arch.o ;./arch section .text global _start s: db 'Arch is the best!',0ah l equ $-s _start: mov rax,1 mov rdi,1 mov rsi,s mov rdx,l syscall mov rax,60 xor rdi,rdi syscall ``` ``` echo "Arch is the best!" ``` ``` console.log('Arch is the best!'); ``` ``` NSLog(@"Arch is the best!"); ``` ``` print_endline "Arch is the best!" ``` ``` printf("Arch is the best!\n") ``` ``` Ook. Pause ``` ``` .section .data archIsBest: .ascii "Arch is the best!\n" archIsBest_len: .long . - archIsBest .section .text .globl _start _start: xorl %ebx, %ebx movl $4, %eax xorl %ebx, %ebx incl %ebx leal archIsBest, %ecx movl archIsBest_len, %edx int $0x80 xorl %eax, %eax incl %eax xorl %ebx, %ebx int $0x80 ``` ``` println("Arch is the best!"); ``` ``` format('Arch is the best~n',[]). ``` ``` print('Arch is the best!') ``` ``` PRINT "Arch is the best!" ``` ``` archIsBest <- function() { cat("Arch is the best!\n") } archIsBest() ``` ``` #lang racket (let ([str "Arch is the best!\n"]) (write-string str) (values)) ``` ``` #!/usr/bin/ruby -w puts 'Arch is the best!' ``` ``` fn main() { println!("Arch is the best!"); } ``` ``` salt '*' event.fire '{"data":"Arch Is the best!"}' 'arch/best' ``` ``` object ArchIsBest extends App { println("Arch is the best!") } ``` ``` (display "Arch is the best!\n") ``` ``` #!/usr/bin/env seed print ('Arch is the best'); ``` ``` Arch is the Best. Arthur, a young man who is the best. Isabella, a likewise young woman who be. The Ghost, an undead who is the article. Beatrice, a young woman who is an adjective. Act I: Setting of the Variables. Scene I: Setting of Isabella and Arthur. [Enter Arthur and Isabella] Arthur: You are as dirty as the square of the sum of a rotten smelly foul devil and a vile lie! You are as bold as the sum of yourself and an evil hog! Isabella: Thou art as big as the square of a cute fair sweet flower! You are as proud as the sum of thyself and a cow. [Exit Arthur] Scene II: Setting of The Ghost. [Enter The Ghost] Isabella: You art as loving as myself. Thou are as huge as the sum of yourself and twice a red old hair. You are as cowardly as the sum of yourself and a fat goat! [Exit Isabella] Scene III: Setting of Beatrice. [Enter Beatrice] The Ghost: Thou are as good as the sum of Isabella and a mighty fine rich noble King. [Exeunt The Ghost and Beatrice] Act II: Printing Arch is the Best. Scene I: Arch. [Enter Arthur and Beatrice] Beatrice: Speak thy mind! You art as peaceful as the quotient between thyself and the clearest Lord. Arthur: Speak your mind! [Exeunt Arthur and Beatrice] [Enter Isabella and The Ghost] The Ghost: Thou are as normal as the sum of thyself and a town. Speak thy mind! Isabella: Speak your mind! [Exit Isabella] [Enter Arthur] The Ghost: Speak thy mind! [Exit Arthur] Scene II: is. [Enter Beatrice] Beatrice: Thou are as old as the sum of yourself and a nose. Speak your mind! The Ghost: You art as pretty as the sum of thyself and a face. Speak your mind. [Exit The Ghost] [Enter Arthur] Beatrice: Speak thy mind. Scene III: the. Arthur: You are as blue as the sum of yourself and a hamster. Speak thy mind! [Exit Arthur] [Enter The Ghost] Beatrice: You are as prompt as the sum of thyself and a lie! Speak your mind. [Exit Beatrice] [Enter Isabella] The Ghost: You art as happy as the sum of thyself and a large moon. Speak thy mind! [Exit The Ghost] [Enter Arthur] Isabella: Speak thy mind. [Exit Arthur] Scene IV: Best. [Enter Beatrice] Beatrice: Thou are as blue as the sum of the sum of a curse and thyself and a bad codpiece. Speak your mind! You art as lovely as the sum of the sum of the happiness and yourself and a blossoming flower. Speak thy mind. Isabella: You are as healthy as the sum of yourself and a plague! Speak thy mind. Thou art as huge as the sum of thyself and a hero. Speak your mind! [Exit Beatrice] [Enter Arthur] Isabella: You art as green as the sum of thyself and a mother. Speak your mind. [Exeunt] ``` ``` Shoes.app :width => 135, :height => 30 do para "Arch is the Best!" end ``` ``` Transcript show: 'Arch is the best!'. ``` ``` SELECT 'Arch is the best!'; SELECT 'Arch is the best!' from dual; -- for Oracle DB ``` ``` print "Arch is the best!\n" ``` ``` print("Arch is the best!") ``` ``` #!/usr/bin/env tclsh puts "Arch is the best!" ``` ``` say it with me, "Arch is the best!"; america is great. ``` ``` #include EFI_STATUS EFIAPI ArchIsTheBest ( IN EFI_HANDLE ImageHandle, IN EFI_SYSTEM_TABLE *SystemTable ) { SystemTable -> ConOut-> OutputString(SystemTable->ConOut, L"Arch is the best!\n"); return EFI_SUCCESS; } ``` ``` void main(string[] args) { stdout.printf("\nArch is the best!\n\n"); } ``` ``` "Arch is the best!" cha' ``` ``` module top; initial $display("Arch is the best!"); endmodule ``` ``` use std.textio.all; entity top is end top; architecture behaviour of top is begin process begin write (output, String'("Arch is the best!")); wait; end process; end behaviour; ``` ``` echo 'Arch is the best!' ``` ``` void setup() { Serial.begin(9600); } void loop() { Serial.print("Arch is the best!"); } ``` ``` Module Arch Sub Main() MsgBox("Arch is the best!") End Sub End Module ``` ``` #include #include #include #include int main() { Display *d; Window w; XEvent e; int s; if (!(d = XOpenDisplay(NULL))) { fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't open display, but Arch is the best!\n"); exit(1); } s = DefaultScreen(d); w = XCreateSimpleWindow(d, RootWindow(d,s), 0, 0, 110, 20, 0, 0, WhitePixel(d,s)); XSelectInput(d, w, ExposureMask | KeyPressMask); XMapWindow(d,w); while (1) { XNextEvent(d, &e); if (e.type == Expose) { XDrawString(d, w, DefaultGC(d, s), 5, 15, "Arch is the best!", 17); } } XCloseDisplay(d); return 0; } ``` ``` FUNC Main() int IO.write("Arch is the best!") RETURN 0 } ``` ``` #!/bin/zsh -f setopt extendedglob print -- $(tput setaf 2) ${$(<<<${${${(@j: :)${(@s:_:)${:-What_Linux_is_the_best?}}}/* (#b)([A-Z]i)/Arch $match[1]}} tr '?' '!')} $(tput sgr0) ```
